oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Lt. Peter Brown, Co. E, 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is copy print is most likely Lt. Peter Brown, Co. E, 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA. This regiment mustered in at Chattanooga in 1864 and was part of the operations against Gatewood's guerrillas in McClemore's Cove in Feb. 1864. Brown enlisted in October 1864 and mustered out of the army in June 1865.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Brown, Peter
